attributes.action: Apply  to MPs  housing  expense claims  the same criteria as bedroom tax
attributes.additional_details:
Some Members of Parliament do not appreciate  the difficulties  which many families face.

Did one cabinet member say that he could live  on   £54.00   for a week.

Members of Parliament should  be made to experience   ATOS medicals.

MPs  should go into Job Centres and pretend to be  unemployed or disabled   and experience   the rudeness and  awkwardness  of the DWP staff  towards them.
